name: Downtown Movies in the Park Pre-event Party: Meet New Friends

location.name: The Pint Public House, Up the Stairs

description:
Meet fellow Torontoians then walk over to David Pecaut Square to watch a movie under the stars from approximately 9:00 pm onwards. "Downtown Movies in the Park" is presented by the Toronto Downtown West BIA in partnership with TIFF.

What your ticket includes:
- First 80 people to attend the event will receive a complimentary drink 
- TIFF themed trivia event hosted by Todotoronto 
- Magnetic Photo Booth - special photo booth/photo opps to capture the night
- Glowsticks and icebreaker games

Tickets are non-exchangeable.
Dress Code: Casual Dress Code.
Please wear comfortable shoes.

name: Trees Around the Branch at Leaside Library
description:
The Leaside Branch and its neighbourhood is home to a variety of trees. Join City of Toronto Urban Forestry staff to explore the natural world on a local neighbourhood walk. Discover how to identify various species and learn fun facts about their cultural and ecological significance.

Children under 12 must be accompanied by a parent/caregiver.

Please note that the tour will start and end at the Leaside Branch and will be guided by the City of Toronto Urban Forestry staff. There may be uneven, unpaved surfaces along the route outside and around the neighbourhood. Please dress and prepare accordingly for this outdoor program (e.g. gloves/mittens, hats, sunscreen, water, comfortable shoes).

organizer.name: Urban Forestry, Natural Environment and Community Programs
